Name: Solitary Path
QuestDesc: A cryptic message reveals the Séance Society's involvement in Jinzhou's disappearances. Is this the key to unlocking the truth?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Chixia just called me. I wonder what's happening...)

Options.PlotLineKey: Oh no. Did I break the law or something?
Hello Chixia, what's up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Is that your first reaction? Come on!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway! You know, we could really use your help with this ongoing case!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's the thing, we could really use your help with this ongoing case...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've been getting a lot of missing persons reports recently.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nobody ever saw those people assaulted or anything, they just vanished.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some of those people are even Resonators or they've served in the military!

Options.PlotLineKey: These cases might be connected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since you're always coming and going from the city, can you help me watch out for anything weird or suspicious?

Options.PlotLineKey: Sure thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much! Knew I could count on you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ring me up when you spot anything sus, yeah? Laterz!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (You received a message right after hanging up with Chixia.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chixia contacts you to say that several Jinzhou citizens have recently gone missing. She asks you to stay alert for anything suspicious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The Séance Society... Never heard of them before. They said they have a "solution"... But how? This is very suspicious, no matter how I look at it.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Guess I'll just go and see for myself.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Man with Hollow Eyes
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh… So you've accepted my invitation, Rover.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you from the Séance Society?

Dialogues.Speaker: Man with Hollow Eyes
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, yes. My name is Lirong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since you are here, you must have lost someone, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shy Little Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy…

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, Yuanyuan, no need to be afraid… {Male=He;Female=She}'s not one of those evil Patrollers. You're safe with me.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this your daughter?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, my daughter… Her name is Yuanyuan. My only precious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am Daddy's precious?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absolutely, my dear. We will stay together... Nothing can take you from me again...

Options.PlotLineKey: She was taken from you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, yes... Once we were separated by an unfortunate turn of events... But now I have her back, thanks to the Séance Society's help...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Truly a miracle, is it not?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you… Yes, you too can be reunited with your loved ones... Just come join us...

Options.PlotLineKey: So... Your daughter had died?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! She didn't... She was never gone!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can't you see? Yuanyuan, she... She's still alive! Alive and well!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy!? What's happening…? You're scaring me…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (He seems off. Is he Overclocking?)

Options.PlotLineKey: Calm down! I'll get you a doctor!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! No doctor! I don't need anything!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am not leaving her… You're not leaving daddy, right Yuanyuan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wah... I...

Options.PlotLineKey: He might hurt the girl... I must act fast!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: An anonymous email leads you to Lirong and his daughter, Yuanyuan. Lirong is a member of the Séance Society, a group that claims to reunite members with their loved ones. He invites you to join, but becomes agitated when asked about his daughter's fate, refusing to accept that she is no longer truly alive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan!

Options.PlotLineKey: Stop, you're going to injure her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shut up! Take your hands off her NOW!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! Daddy! *screams*
That's enough, Lirong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Urgh…!?
She'll be safe in my care. You still have other things to do, remember?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huff... Ugh... No! Don't! Yuanyuan!
Lirong!
Do you want to lose your daughter again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Urgh… Gah… No, I... Fine, I'll leave it to you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you know him?

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, hand over the girl…
You see, that man is her father. Why do you want to separate them?

Options.PlotLineKey: He is dangerous…

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh well, whatever. Yuanyuan? Come over here please?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes...
Good girl. Stay here, Yuanyuan.

Options.PlotLineKey: What did you do!?

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And why would you be concerned? Smart {Male=boys;Female=girls} know how to mind their own business.
Oh? You're quite the fighter… Hmm, how about…

Options.PlotLineKey: We're not fighting now? I can go on if you want.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh... They're coming… It's the Patrollers. We can't let them find out about Yuanyuan.
Now if you don't want to get into trouble, better do as I say... I'll explain everything later.
Including what's happening with the "Séance Society"…

Options.PlotLineKey: Fine.
No.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Smart choice...
Oh, don't be so pigheaded. What if I pinned the blame on you?
Say, for trying to abduct this little girl? You'll have a real time talking your way out of that... Right, Yuanyuan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, Miss Yinlin...

Options.PlotLineKey: (Guess I'll have to do as she said, for now.)

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good. Now come give me a hand. We'll need to hide the traces of fighting here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A mysterious woman arrives and convinces Lirong to leave. After he departs, a fight breaks out between you and the woman over Yuanyuan. The confrontation only ends when a Patroller shows up. To uncover the truth about the Séance Society and the missing persons, you decide to cooperate with the woman, starting by cleaning up the scene.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything's back to where they were before…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Found a piece of paper inside one of the boxes. Seems like a transaction record.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Date of transaction... It says today. Items... 4 Reincarnation Puppets. What are those?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Signee... "Lirong". Probably forgot to take it with him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That should do the trick…
This should be good enough to get past their eyes.
The Patrollers are almost here… Shh.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You there. We heard some commotion coming from this area. What's going on?
Nothing, officer. We were just hanging out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Then what was that loud banging and shouting?
Oh. This girl just tripped over. Poor thing nearly cried her eyes out.
I'm sure it's just a misunderstanding.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that so…? Then what did you do after that?
It seems she can't find her father. We were just trying to help.
Right, Rover?

Options.PlotLineKey: Huh? Oh… Yeah, exactly…

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see… So they're just being kind!

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't have other questions, you can...

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Leave the girl to us. We'll help find her father.
Thanks, but we've got this. Little one seems quite shy, she's just warming up to us. Wouldn't want to bother you further.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, you're not bothering us. It's our job to help civilians in need.
Trust me, I understand how tedious a Patroller's job can get. That's why I want to help.
The name's Yinlin. I am also a Patroller… Here's my ID.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, a fellow Patroller...

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You sure this is real? Never seen her around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You think I can't tell a fake ID when I see it? Shut your mouth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No reason you would have seen me. I don't work here, just visiting Jinzhou on vacation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, makes sense.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then we'll leave the girl to you. Thank you for your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If can't find her dad, bring her to the Patroller Station... C'mon, we're going, rookie.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Enjoy your day! Have fun in Jinzhou! Oh hey! Wait up, Captain!

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you really a Patroller?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? Do I not look the part?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I didn't plan to blow my cover, but that Patroller was sharp…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I would've risked them finding out about Yuanyuan otherwise.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why didn't you stop Lirong then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should see for yourself...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let your soul rest. Return to your true form, daughter of Lirong—Yuanyuan…

Options.PlotLineKey: What the...!? Yuanyuan... Is she an android?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. A "puppet" to be exact… This helpless little girl before you, Lirong's beloved daughter, is nothing but a humanoid robot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are both questioned by the Patroller, but the two of you conceal what happened. During the conversation, you discover that the woman is actually a Patroller named Yinlin. After the Patroller leaves, Yinlin reveals that "Yuanyuan" is, in fact, a puppet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the so-called Séance Society... They are the ones behind Jinzhou's recent missing person cases.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They offer these puppets to people who have lost their loved ones.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These puppets can perfectly replicate the personalities of the deceased… To those mourning people, they are indistinguishable from the living.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan... Did she really pass away?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes… With the puppet, she has been resurrected by her father's longing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: People gave up everything to join this Society for one chance to reunite with their beloved.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for how they got their hands on these puppets... I have no idea yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Beware, the puppets may seem harmless, but those who got too attached are much more likely to Overclock.

Options.PlotLineKey: Didn't know they were so dangerous...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong's the recruiter. You're the perfect outsider, traveling all alone, ripe for the taking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh... But it seems he picked the worst candidate possible.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then why are you still helping him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I need to apprehend the true culprit behind this group…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But this is not your problem. I'm on a mission. Leave now and forget everything that happened here today, will you?

Options.PlotLineKey: Were you looking for this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong's transaction record… Where did you find it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh*… You're such a box of surprises.

Options.PlotLineKey: You promised to tell me everything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure, why not. I'll give you what you want...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I don't want prying eyes. If you're really that curious, meet me outside the city at these coordinates.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin explains that the Séance Society is behind the recent disappearances in Jinzhou. They provide lifelike puppets in place of lost loved ones, and many desperate people join the Society for this reason. However, frequent interaction with these puppets greatly increases the risk of Overclocking. Yinlin is on the trail of those responsible and invites you to meet her outside the city if you want to learn more about the case.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We meet again. As I expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place seems safe enough...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, anything questions for me?

Options.PlotLineKey: Tell me about your mission.
Tell me about the Séance Society.
Tell me about Lirong.
I don't have more questions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... Didn't know you cared so much about me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is supposed to be confidential, but… I've been authorized to make my own calls.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My orders were clear: infiltrate the Séance Society, gather evidence of their crimes, and find the culprit behind it all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So far, I've had no luck meeting any of their higher-ups. Just playing assistant for Lirong to gain their trust.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They operate under the guise of a non-profit charity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Séance Society lures people in with the promise of bringing back their loved ones. But it's all a sham… You've seen firsthand the truth behind their supposed "resurrection".

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite previously keeping a low-profile, they've recently become more active and are using people like Lirong to recruit new victims.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From what I've gathered, they're in cahoots with Fractsidus...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And a Fractsidus intervention would've only made things worse.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong, once a Midnight Ranger, lost his daughter in a tragic accident.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He joined the Society to see his daughter again, and he's been feverishly trying to convince others to do the same.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He truly believes the puppets are living miracles. A godsent means of redemption.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He could have been a good father, but his obsession with losing his daughter consumed him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aside from recruiting new people in Jinzhou, Lirong and I were given another task. See the transaction record in your hands?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some Fractsidus members ordered a batch of puppets from the Society. We're in charge of handling the deal.

Options.PlotLineKey: They make puppets for the Fractsidus too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not until their collaboration started. The Fractsidus has been demanding prototype puppets regularly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I plan to investigate these prototype puppets for manufacturer clues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Lirong keeps things very tight. He never takes me to his storage place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's almost time for the deal… I need to bring Yuanyuan back to Lirong before he gets suspicious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the Fractsidus in play, things could go south very fast…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now you know the nitty-gritty details, it's still not late to call it quits.

Options.PlotLineKey: I want to find out who's making these puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't seem to be mourning someone…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why the interest?

Options.PlotLineKey: They may have a way to recover my memories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've suffered a memory loss… I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed, if they can make such lifelike puppets by tapping into people's memories, perhaps they could help you remember too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we need to find them first... You can be my civilian investigator. What do you say?

Options.PlotLineKey: Why not. What's the plan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong and I are about to meet the Fractsidus for our deal. He will then leave to get the puppets at the storage house.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I need you to follow him and send me the coordinates once you're there.

Options.PlotLineKey: Will do.
I need to think it through…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you're in already? Didn't even think twice?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh well. You seem really confident, and that's a good thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're coming. You'll hide and watch Lirong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll bring Yuanyuan to him... hopefully he won't suspect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin reactivates the puppet. It turns back into Yuanyuan's form.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rise and shine, Yuanyuan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Yinlin? W-where am I…? Where's Daddy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, Yuanyuan. I'm taking you to Daddy in just a moment. But before we do, promise me you'll be a good girl, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay! I promise!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's my girl. Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm leaving the rest to you, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand. This mission won't be an easy one, you better think it through.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But be quick. It's almost time for the deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin tells you that the Séance Society is a dangerous organization that lures people in by promising to bring back their loved ones. They appear to be linked to the Fractsidus, and her mission is to gather evidence against them and identify the mastermind behind it all. Currently, she is investigating the prototype puppets in the hope they hold clues about their creator. Eager to recover your lost memories, you decide to assist Yinlin by following Lirong to the puppets' storage location.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? Have you come to a decision?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll help.
Give me some more time…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you still decided to join me…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You must be pretty confident. That's good.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're coming. You'll hide and watch Lirong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll bring Yuanyuan to him... hopefully he won't suspect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin reactivates the puppet. It turns back into Yuanyuan's form.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rise and shine, Yuanyuan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Yinlin? W-where am I…? Where's Daddy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, Yuanyuan. I'm taking you to Daddy in just a moment. But before we do, promise me you'll be a good girl, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay! I promise!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's my girl. Now, let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll leave the rest to you now, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand. The mission won't be an easy one, you should think it through.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But be quick. It's almost time for the deal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong. Here's your daughter, as I promised.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan!! I was so afraid… I can't bear to lose you again…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please don't cry, Daddy… Was I being bad?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, you're always a good girl... always...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, enough with the make-believe. That's a puppet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy… am I a puppet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! You're not! Yuanyuan, I...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan's ten times more human than you people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You call that thing human? Hah! That's just a robot lab rat.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You...!

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Enough, we don't have time for this… Where's our stuff? Bring them out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong, go bring them the prototype puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huff... Huff... I…

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey… We ain't got all day. Hurry up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! I won't let you have them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll make you regret this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After him! You're going nowhere either, Missy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here we go…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Lirong's trying to escape with the puppets. Here's hoping that Rover can stop him in time…)

Options.PlotLineKey: Lirong is our only lead... I must follow him!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You follow closely behind Lirong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Furious with the Fractsidus for their disdain toward the puppets, Lirong breaks their deal and attempts to escape with the puppets. You quickly follow him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Daddy… I'm tired...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's okay, Yuanyuan... They won't find us here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those scary people... Are they coming after me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not just you, Yuanyuan... They want all the puppets here. But I won't let them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll make sure every puppet finds home, together with people who love and need them. I will NOT let those freaks use them for experiments!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Dollmaker… How could you be the first to betray our belief...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ("Dollmaker"… Is that the leader of the Séance Society?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is Master Dollmaker bad, Daddy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I'm not sure anymore. He was our hope... He saved us all, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* Doesn't matter now. I must get all of you to safety first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I guess they still have some morals. There's still things they won't do.)
I spotted them! Over there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can't hide from this good ol' sniffer of mine!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan, get behind Daddy, quick...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll grab these puppets now. What about that guy, boss?

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ice him… We'll take that puppet behind him too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh… Urgh… Huff... I will not... Let you! Aaaghhah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Lirong's going to severely Overclock at this rate.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Lirong
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eek… *gasp*…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yuanyuan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: H-Help!

Options.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan, take your father somewhere safe!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! What the hell are you doing here?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One {Male=man;Female=woman}'s not gonna make a difference. Get rid of them now!
Forgetting someone, are we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Determined to protect the puppets from becoming Fractsidus experimental subjects, Lirong attempts to hide. He reveals that the leader of the Séance Society is known as the Dollmaker. As the Fractsidus closes in, putting them all in danger, you and Yinlin step in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What the… Those idiots. They were supposed to take care of you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Careful!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry I knocked out your friends earlier. We're not planning to start anything with the Fractsidus, really.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you say? Care to give Lirong and his daughter a little break? They're our people, after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You may have these puppets here. We can pretend none of this ever happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Slim Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You think we're stupid or what? We're taking the puppets, and you're all going under!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aww, you sure you want to do this? We're business partners, remember?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chubby Fractsidus Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Partners? You're just a bunch of lab rat keepers trying to play the game!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So they're not up for peace talks. What do you say, Rover?

Options.PlotLineKey: Count me in. It's not like they'll let me off the hook.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... True. You know your Fractsidus well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've got some moves. Impressive…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Guess I can rely on you a bit more. I'll be counting on you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin tries to mediate between the Séance Society and the Fractsidus, but the negotiations fail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did you like the fight? Are you injured?

Options.PlotLineKey: Not a scratch.
They were a bit hard to handle.
I can take on a dozen more!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those were the Fractsidus and you didn't bat an eye... Looks like you've got the skills, and the nerve too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, better stay cautious. I've seen too many die from recklessness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ooh, really? I'll sit back and leave it all to you next time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We took care of them for now… but there's probably more trouble coming our way.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is your cover at risk?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My, my... Are you worried about me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a surprise. I thought you never trusted me this entire time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fine, I'll spare you the teasing for now… Your serious face is quite cute though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, we took care of all the Fractsidus people here. If the Society becomes suspicious, I'll just pin everything on them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They may still question me, but I've mastered gaining trust with lies. It's the key to being an undercover investigator.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just like what I did to you… Try feeling your back.

Options.PlotLineKey: You planted a bug on me!?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A bug and a tracker. Yes. How else did you think I got here so quickly?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I put it there the first time we met.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why did you do this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Don't trust anyone"… That's the first thing I learned in training.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You may not belong to any group, but you seemed to care for Lirong and Yuanyuan, and you want to recover lost memories…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't risk you betraying me by helping them run off or selling me out. Better safe than sorry.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then I'm sure you overheard the name "Dollmaker"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course. Dollmaker... He must be a big deal in the Séance Society, or even their leader.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're getting close to the truth... But we have another issue at hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I did a quick checkup on Lirong. He just passed out from Overclocking. Lucky for him it wasn't that bad.

Options.PlotLineKey: What about Yuanyuan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yuanyuan returned to her puppet form once Lirong fell unconscious. Not even I can reactivate her now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I doubt she'll be reactivated any time soon. We've reached a dead end with Lirong.

Options.PlotLineKey: We can try the prototype puppets?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, I was planning to. We may find some clues.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But we gotta move first. Can't stay here for long.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go collect the puppets. I'll look after Lirong and Yuanyuan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She admits she tracked you using a positioning device placed on you earlier, explaining that her undercover role makes it hard for her to trust anyone. With Lirong and Yuanyuan no longer providing new leads, your only hope lies in the prototype puppets, so you decide to gather as many of them as possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This puppet... Next to it is a tag with the recipient's name and identity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Identity... Wife of Fujie. Passed away from illness."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "I couldn't bear the sight of her enduring such pain… How I wished I could trade places with her."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "But now I am offered a chance to bring her back to my side. Thank you... Master Dollmaker."

Options.PlotLineKey: Collect puppet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This puppet... Next to it is a tag with the recipient's name and identity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Identity... Parents of Xiaofu. Killed during a Tacet Discord Outbreak."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Mommy, Daddy, please come back... I'll be a good boy from now on. I promise..."

Options.PlotLineKey: Collect puppet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This puppet... Next to it is a tag with the recipient's name and identity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Identity... Twin sister of Linsi. Went missing in an accident."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "It's all my fault... If I didn't leave, she wouldn't have gone missing like that."

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "It's been ten years... I just want to tell her I'm sorry."

Options.PlotLineKey: Collect puppet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Acknowledged… Is that our only option…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Yinlin seems to be on a call with someone.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... I believe it's unnecessary...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes… Understood… I'll have it taken care of.

Options.PlotLineKey: Were you calling someone?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes… It's my contact from the Public Security Bureau.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They'll be sending people over soon. We can leave Lirong and Yuanyuan in their care.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you done with the puppets?

Options.PlotLineKey: They're all here. No luck with clues, though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's fine. We'll dig further once we're in a safer location.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My contact informed me of a safe house not far from here… The Patrollers will meet us there.

Options.PlotLineKey: How do we find this safe house?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have a designated meet-up spot. There will be wolf-shaped markings nearby to show us the way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's move. Can't let the Fractsidus find us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After collecting all the prototype puppets, Yinlin plans to take them to a safe place for further investigation. She learns from a fellow Patroller that there is a safehouse nearby for undercover agents, and you both head there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These must be the coordinates. The Sensor may reveal more clues.

Chapters.Title: Use Sensor to find the markings

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This must be the marking. That way.

Chapters.Title: Follow the markings to the safe house

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No more markings in sight... This must be the safe house.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look, there's a device on that wall.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm… We need a passcode.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They were thorough. The safe house is hidden and has a passcode.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There should be some hints nearby. Let's look around.

Chapters.Title: Enter the safe house and investigate

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should be good in here. This safe house is equipped with signal jammers and counter-surveillance measures.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fractsidus won't find us here.

Options.PlotLineKey: Really living up to its name...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, it's as safe and secure as it gets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing gets in, and nothing gets out.

Options.PlotLineKey: But... where are the Patrollers?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't bother. You won't find any Patrollers here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I told you before...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't trust anyone. Remember?
What a special specimen...
Time to have my men take {Male=him;Female=her} back to the camp...

Chapters.Title: Investigate in the warehouse for more information
Investigate in the warehouse for more information

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I was trapped inside this box... It's easier to open now that I broke it.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (There's something between the cracks…)

Options.PlotLineKey: Retrieve the tablet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A tablet with an encrypted transmitter? Messages sent through these are less traceable, I heard.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (But why would I find it here...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ("The Séance Society Name List"…?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Wu Sheng/Shunlian… Lianyue/Lian Xiaosheng… Jinlu/He Chang… Lady Guan/Xiaoguan…"

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the list goes on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Some of the names have been crossed-out.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (These are probably the Séance Society members… The people who went missing.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Am I in their base of operation?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I guess that's all the clues. Anyway, this place is definitely connected to the Society.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should use it to inform Chixia and the others of my situation, and my current coordinates.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You realize the place is connected to the Séance Society, so you use the communication panel you found earlier to send the coordinates and details of the situation to Chixia.

Chapters.Title: Use the tablet to notify the Public Security Bureau

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Done... Here's hoping they'll get my message.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Now, how do I get out of here...)
Oh, you're awake? Come out then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look at you, fresh as the dew.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yinlin… So it really was you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I went with maximum voltage back there. Didn't expect you'd wake up so soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thought you might never wake up again. I was gonna get Dr. Wu Sheng to check on you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Isn't that what you wanted?
Am I supposed to say "Thank you"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have no interest in taking your life. Master Dollmaker wants to see you alive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're welcome. But save your gratitude for Master Dollmaker, since he asked me to keep you alive. We'd be in trouble if you died.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why you insolent little whippersnapper. Show some manners when you're talking to Miss Yinlin.

Options.PlotLineKey: Who? Me…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where is your family?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Youngsters like you, always runnin' off and leaving yer family to rot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's "Family Reunion Day." Ain't no way I'm lettin' anyone leave this camp.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go sit down next to the bonfire and stay there. Don't yer be thinking of slippin' off… Miss Yinlin, show 'em the way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You heard the kind lady. Now keep your mouth shut and follow me.

Options.PlotLineKey: And if I say no?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can try to escape. I wouldn't recommend it, though.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without Dr. Wu Sheng's antidote, you wouldn't make it too far with that poison inside of you.

Options.PlotLineKey: You expect me to believe that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's all up to you. Just know I have no reason to lie.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were planning to ask Master Dollmaker about your memories anyway, so why not come with me?

Options.PlotLineKey: What exactly is this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the Séance Society's headquarters. We all live here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why don't you join the Society? Make things easier for all of us.

Options.PlotLineKey: Where do I sign up?
No.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good try. Try not to sound so obvious next time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I expected as much. But you may have a change of mind later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on. Joining or not, it won't hurt to introduce yourself first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You soon discover that it was Yinlin who trapped you here. She reveals that this is the Séance Society's base and invites you once more to join the organization, offering to introduce you to its members.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well. What are you waiting for?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Youngsters these days… always complaining about us old-timers being naggy.

Options.PlotLineKey: Umm… I haven't even said anything yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandma Guan patrols this place daily to keep us safe. She used to be a Midnight Ranger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sigh, there's no one like my precious boy. No matter how long this old lady ran her mouth, he'd always listen till the end.

Options.PlotLineKey: Who's that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her grandson.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such a sweet boy he was… His parents died young. I was the only one he could rely on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And they took him away from me, as if he hadn't suffered enough misfortunes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How lucky I was to have Master Dollmaker bring him back to me... Praise the heavens for this miracle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll do anything for Master Dollmaker. Nothing will ever be enough to repay his kindness...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But...Why would he make puppets for those Fractsidus devils…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sure Master Dollmaker has his own reasons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lady Guan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... I'm just grateful to have my grandson back. Can't ask for more.

Chapters.Title: Talk to the members of the Séance Society

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, stranger. The name's Jinlu. We're the guards here, He Chang and I.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you a Resonator?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right you are. The two of us and Lirong used to be Midnight Rangers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How are you feeling? Got the Overclocking under control?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for asking, Miss Yinlin. I'm feeling a lot better now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lirong though… He... he had it rough back there.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why stay with a puppet when you know it's dangerous?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We served in the same unit. He Chang Overclocked trying to save me… In the end, he didn't make it.

Options.PlotLineKey: What if you end up Overclocking too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinlu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know the risks… I'm just... I'll do anything. Anything to make it up to him, if I still can.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You discover that Jinlu met his fallen comrade He Chang here and chose to stay because of their strong bond.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Yinlin… Who might this be?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. {Male=He;Female=She}'s Master Dollmaker's guest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see… Whatever. I just want to stay with my son.

Options.PlotLineKey: Your son… Is he a puppet too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So what!? He's still my one and only son… What would you know!?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, let's stop it here...

Options.PlotLineKey: What on earth happened...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianyue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why I won't let anyone threaten our peaceful life ever again…

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You learn that Lianyue, who also reunited with her deceased child with the Society's help, refuses to let anyone disrupt their current life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dr. Wu Sheng, how's Lirong doing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Out of danger for now, but he's still in a coma.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry... I'm not that familar with taking care of Resonators. There's not much else I can do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shame. He shouldn't have disobeyed Master Dollmaker.

Options.PlotLineKey: Was it you who injected me with poison?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, yes. Master Dollmaker asked me to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We had no other choice. You refused to join us.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did you poison everyone else here too?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, why would I need to? They're not leaving here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the only place where we can forever live with our loved ones.

Options.PlotLineKey: You're a doctor. You should know how dangerous those puppets are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I do. But I also know why we'll hold on to them no matter what.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Doctors can't save everyone. Not even the best of us can.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I could only watch as my better half passed away in agony...

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Dollmaker saved us with his puppets. That's something no doctor can ever achieve.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What about you? Do you have someone you desperately need to see again?

Options.PlotLineKey: As a matter of fact, I do.
No, I do not.
I don't know…

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can ask Master Dollmaker for help. He'll bring them back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rather fortunate of you... or shall I say, unfortunate? To not have a single person that you cherish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wu Sheng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Feeling lost? I suggest taking a walk and go chat with everyone a bit. We're all for helping each other.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wu Sheng tells you that even the best doctors can't save everyone, just as he was not able to save his wife. The Dollmaker's puppets gave them a second chance, something no doctor could offer. While Wu Sheng understands the dangers of the puppets, he also knows how much they mean to the people here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just remembered there's another place we need to visit. Come with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Relax. Nothing's going to happen to you... Not yet, at least.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You there… You're not one of us. How did you sneak in here?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quxiu, are you injured?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Yinlin!? You're back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy there. You need to rest…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is Master Dollmaker's guest. You're safe with {Male=him;Female=her}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is my duty to protect our people... I'll be fine.

Options.PlotLineKey: Those are no small wounds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm fine... Ugh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No more duties if you died from those wounds... We no longer need you to protect this place, remember?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Master Dollmaker, he… he told me to protect this place at all cost.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That won't be necessary... Master Dollmaker's not coming back. I'll be getting rid of everything here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Dollmaker's ultimate goal is near, and he won't need them anymore... Neither will I.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Enough… You heard what I said. Stay put, I'll go fetch some first-aid for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin heads off to retrieve some medicine from Dr. Wu Sheng.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Urgh… Damn those monsters...

Options.PlotLineKey: Did the Tacet Discords injure you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've fought off quite a lot of them lately. I just got a bit careless.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do they come at your camp often?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some of us said they could be attracted to the puppets…

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't believe that though. I'll defend this place, no matter what.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why are you guarding this place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know... This place sounded super important to Master Dollmaker. He told me to protect it with my life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... Indeed, he hasn't visited this place for a long time now... Maybe Miss Yinlin was right...

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway... I'll still be keeping them safe. Miss Yinlin said she'll get rid of everything here, but I believe they still retain some importance to her and Master Dollmaker.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should check this place out while Yinlin's gone. Might find something about that Dollmaker.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Looks like a child's diary...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (There's a crude drawing folded inside, with some scribbled words on the back.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Is it the handiwork of one of the children back there?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Or… a memory of an adult member's youth?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This... It reads like the writing of a Patroller undercover.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (But why is it here? Is the Dollmaker doing business with one of the Patrollers?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (What did she want to tell the Dollmaker... Guess I'll never know.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The message is still here, which means it probably never reached the Dollmaker.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The Dollmaker has been delving into his Forte, trying to make a certain puppet.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Whose puppet is he trying to create?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After a while, Yinlin came back with some first-aid supplies to treat Quxiu's wounds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should do it. If it still hurts, go to Dr. Wu Sheng for a detailed checkup.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Miss Yinlin! It's just a scratch... Nothing to worry about.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go find somewhere safe to rest. You're relieved of your duties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Miss Yinlin...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're burning it all. Stand back, I'll use my thunder to start up a fire... No trace will be left.

Options.PlotLineKey: You sure you want to do this? I think you may regret it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh? So you've read what's written inside?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes, I have.
No, I haven't.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You seem to enjoy meddling in other people's business...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're really not a good liar, I'll give you that...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On second thought, the past can't be erased anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Burning these makes no difference, and the flames could attract Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still, Quxiu, you should leave this place. We don't need you to protect these anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What if those monsters come at us again? We'll have no one to stop them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your safety matters far more than these objects of the past. If you're okay, go help those who aren't.

Dialogues.Speaker: Quxiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Understood!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Yinlin will be back at any moment now.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should go back to Quxiu.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've talked with everyone I see. Are you joining us now?

Options.PlotLineKey: They're not bad people, but…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...They're just some poor souls longing to see their loved ones again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Dollmaker saves them, letting them make amends for their past regrets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A noble cause, is it not?

Options.PlotLineKey: Is this why you betrayed me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh. How is it betrayal when we were never a team?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Having a cop on our side makes things easier for the Séance Society, don't you agree?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was just a young orphan, never knew who my parents were. Master Dollmaker took me in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He taught me combat, puppetry, temperance, and how to become a Patroller.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I owe my life to him.

Options.PlotLineKey: But he's in for more than just helping people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, his eyes are set on another ultimate goal...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're all his subjects. He needs us to complete the last two puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every one of us has been aware of this, but still decided to join.

Options.PlotLineKey: What kind of puppet is he trying to make?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's not for your ears. Members only, you see?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I do admit you're not like the others.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You rescued Lirong and showed respect to the puppets. They weren't just objects to you, I could tell.

Options.PlotLineKey: I couldn't just stand by and watch.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look at you, ever so righteous...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe you're better suited to be a Patroller than me.

Options.PlotLineKey: You were kind to those people and their puppets, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Kindness…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, or maybe... I couldn't just stand by, either.

Options.PlotLineKey: Can I trust your words this time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's up to you. Trust is a delicate thing. You must follow your instincts and decide how much you're willing to give.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Enough chatter for now. I'll take you to Master Dollmaker's pl...
Help! HELP!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin reveals that she empathizes with these people who just want to see their loved ones again. She reveals that she was once a member of the Séance Society herself. She grew up alongside the Dollmaker and knows that his experiments are aimed at creating two special puppets. However, she keeps the details of this final experiment from you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's going on?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoguan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miss Yinlin! The Tacet Discords are here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go tell your grandma. Get everyone somewhere safe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoguan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: O-okay!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What about you, Rover? Will you join them or flee while you can in this chaos?

Options.PlotLineKey: They're not bad people...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you want to help protect them. Knew it.

Options.PlotLineKey: You owe me the truth after this. Everything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything, huh... The secrets I hold might be bigger than you imagine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you really want to know... You'll need to survive this first!

Dialogues.Speaker: Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Surrender now! We've got you surrounded! You are the leader here, aren't you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My, my. That's quite the party.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey! Who the hell are you? Let {Male=him;Female=her} go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if I don't?

Dialogues.Speaker: Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Freeze! Shut up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. I'm not going anywhere. I've got a hostage, you see?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa! You-You... Don't move!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wouldn't try anything stupid if I were you. Can't risk the VIP of Jinzhou getting hurt, now can we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, fine... Lower your weapons guys!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Trust me… Come this way."

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When the Patrollers besiege the base, Yinlin takes you hostage but secretly passes you a message: "Trust me… Come this way."

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... Some TDs found their way inside, and we're now surrounded by a bunch of cops. Hard to make it out of here with the specimens.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fortunately you caught that Rover. Whether {Male=he;Female=she}'s useful for research or not, holding {Male=him;Female=her} hostage will buy us some time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What should I do next, Master?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's the coordinates. Bring {Male=him;Female=her} to me in the inner chamber.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She}'s a sly one. Ready to bolt any moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have trackers planted on {Male=him;Female=her}. {Male=He;Female=She}'s not going anywhere in our territory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll talk once you get there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You heard him. You're in our turf. Better not get any bright ideas.

Options.PlotLineKey: You'll pay for this…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well that's not your problem. Also, no one's coming to your rescue anytime soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess you managed to send out a distress call? Somehow it slipped past us. Ah… You had an encrypted transmitter tablet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hand it over. Don't try to deceive me.

Options.PlotLineKey: (Hand over the tablet.)
You can dream...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good {Male=boy;Female=girl}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Funny you'd think you have a choice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You are a valuable test subject. I don't want to make things difficult for you, unless you force my hands... Got it?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Here's the thing. Dollmaker's listening to our every word. All my efforts will be wasted if he suspects anything.)

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I'll be typing on this tablet for you to see. I want you to follow my instructions.)

Options.PlotLineKey: (Nod in agreement.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Very well, if you can refrain from unnecessary struggle, we won't have to do things the hard way.

Options.PlotLineKey: Where are we?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't need to know. Now get moving.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (We're in the factory where the Dollmaker makes his puppets. The place is full of traps and his minions. Very dangerous.)

Options.PlotLineKey: At least tell me what he's planning to do with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe. Patience. You'll know once you see him.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Dollmaker's in bed with the Fractsidus, trading Overclock-inducing puppets for resources and funds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I need your help to collect proof of his crimes.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No more wasting time... Let's go.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I'll take off your restraints on the way. I need you to pretend you're still bound, remember?)

Options.PlotLineKey: Understood.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin brings you to meet the Dollmaker, maintaining a façade of hostility due to a bug the Dollmaker planted on you. Through a hidden panel, she explains that this factory produces puppets designed to trigger Overclocking for the Fractsidus in exchange for resources. She needs your help to gather evidence against the Dollmaker's involvement in all this.

Chapters.Title: Explore deeper into the Doll Factory

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Strange. The path is blocked. That thing should open it back up. I'll handle it.

Chapters.Title: Unlock the mechanism through the remote-controlled doll device
Unlock the mechanism through the remote-controlled doll device

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You guarding this place for Master Dollmaker?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Out of my way. Master Dollmaker asked for this person.

Options.PlotLineKey: Something's not right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Commoner
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Urgh... Family... My family...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're Overclocking... Must've been exposed to those puppets for too long...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the bunch of cops who just attacked us finally pushed them over the edge.

Options.PlotLineKey: Watch out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Commoner
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Give my family back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't get through here. But "Zapstring" should be able to get under it.

Chapters.Title: Unlock the mechanism through the remote-controlled doll device

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should deactivate the alarms on the lower levels…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tsk... The control system's crashed. We'll have to force our way through.

Chapters.Title: Unlock the mechanism through the remote-controlled doll device

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good. Those Exiles can't reach us now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Master Dollmaker's chamber is right up ahead... Don't die on me now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So many prototype puppets... How many secrets does this factory hold?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, record the physical status of these puppets. Master needs to know for his research.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Zapstring"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (These are his prized achievements. We need photos of them to prove what he's been up to.)

Options.PlotLineKey: As you wish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph. That's more like it. Remember to capture every detail. I'll be watching you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin reminds you to use your Terminal to record the prototype puppet data.

Chapters.Title: Record information in 3 places using the Zoom Camera

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Military-grade mechs... How did they get their hands on these?

Chapters.Title: Record information in 3 places using the Zoom Camera

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's the total number of prototype puppets... Imagine what would happen if they're all activated at once.

Chapters.Title: Record information in 3 places using the Zoom Camera

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All puppets are powered by these metal canisters... That's why non-Resonators can activate the puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Commoner
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Intruder!! Kill her!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tsk… They can't even recognize me now.

Options.PlotLineKey: What's the plan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Plan? We take them out, of course.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We can't stay here too long… Make it quick.

Chapters.Title: Take the elevator to the top floor
Take the elevator to the top floor
Take the elevator to the top floor
Take the elevator to the top floor

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin, you made it. Have those cops entered the factory?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not yet. But those Exiles were Overclocking and I had to take them down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's fine, they're disposable.

Options.PlotLineKey: How pathetic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're a bunch of outcasts, willing to do whatever it takes to survive. No one would mourn them if they died.

Options.PlotLineKey: I mean you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh...? Me?

Options.PlotLineKey: Your Forte could have saved many, but you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I could save them, I'm sure, but who's going to save me?

Options.PlotLineKey: What are you planning to do?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stop it, Dollmaker... My parents would not consent to being brought back as puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin... I thought at least you would understand me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't blame you. You were too young when they passed away, after all. You hardly remember them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that's why I couldn't revive them from your memories. Not from my own, either.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is where you come in, Rover. You're a godsend, a gift from above.

Options.PlotLineKey: You want to use me for that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Precisely. With help from the Fractsidus, plus your body's data… I will finally create their puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dollmaker, you…

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was an outcast, alone and shunned... Until my mentor and his wife took me in. They were my true family.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll do anything to bring them back, no matter the price...

Options.PlotLineKey: That doesn't mean you can hurt other people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So what? Why should I care?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's almost time. We'll have to leave the factory behind, but there's a couple of prototypes I need to bring.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My identity must stay hidden. Use explosives to stop them if necessary, Yinlin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But our people are still inside the factory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Our people"? There's only the two of us. The rest of them are not worth my concern.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What about Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Same as before, Yinlin. Just knock {Male=him;Female=her} out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need to keep {Male=him;Female=her} intact this time, some level of basic consciousness is enough. The Fractsidus taught me methods to operate on a body like that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll leave two puppets here. To pretend we're still holding {Male=him;Female=her} hostage behind the closed door.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll need the data repository too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... My research data. That's more valuable than my life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take care of the data transfer. Yinlin, you deal with this person. Be quick!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You speak to the Dollmaker and discover that the two final puppets he intends to make are Yinlin's parents—his former mentors. He captured you to get experimental data, hoping to create perfect puppets with the Fractsidus's backing. Now, with the Public Security Bureau involved, he's rushing to relocate both the puppets and his research data.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh… Yinlin! What are you doing?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It all ends here, Dollmaker… You're going nowhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You of all people should know why the Fractsidus offered their help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yinlin… You... How dare you betray me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have never forgotten who I am. My bloodline is one of Jinzhou's Patrollers. I will always uphold my duty, just like my parents before me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They fought to the last minute of their lives, trying to save the innocent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything I've done... I did it for them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... you did it to relive the kindness you once felt.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But my parents are gone. So are everyone else's loved ones... It's time we wake up from this dream you've been spinning.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No! Don't you dare!

Options.PlotLineKey: The Exiles... He just let them in?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Careful... Those people don't look right! They've all Overclocked!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Dollmaker confronts Yinlin after learning of her betrayal. She asserts that, like her parents, she has always been a Patroller and has never forgotten her true identity and duty. She declares she cannot accept the Dollmaker harming others to recapture the warmth of the past.

Options.PlotLineKey: Where are we…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lightning has destroyed the control panel and hologram projectors. This is what the factory really looks like.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This thing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Fractsidus... You got this from them? In exchange for being their pawn?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? Their pawn? Hah! I'm the one pulling their strings, sweetheart!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's over, Dollmaker… Surrender now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh… Gah… Yinlin!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could you do this to me!?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I created this home for my followers. They found salvation through my puppets. I am their savior!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You too, Yinlin! You had the chance to reunite with your family! Why are you doing this to me?!

Options.PlotLineKey: Puppets can never replace real family.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never met my parents, but my actions are guided by their beliefs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a child, I bemoaned my misfortune, but I knew better than to harm others to make up for it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The dead deserve peace. My parents are gone, and I can't change the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the present is mine to control. I can still bring justice to those who caused their untimely end...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's wrong with doing what I can for our happiness? Laws and principles are just tools for those in charge!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is that why you must deprave others of their happiness? Using them as your pawns?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! Suddenly justice matters to you? Don't tell me you still think you're a Patroller?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I already wiped your data from their records. No one knows you were a Patroller. You can't prove it to anyone now.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yinlin…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, they may never allow me back... Doesn't matter now. It's a small price to pay to stop you and the greater evil you serve.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't need a recognized identity to do what's right. I can do it my way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dollmaker
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You… Gah… *coughs*…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should get going. I'm leaving the rest to you, Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please... keep it secret from the Patrollers. Until it's all over. One day, I'll tell them everything myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next time we meet, I'll explain all, and I'll thank you properly, I guess.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yinlin! Wait!

Dialogues.Speaker: Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quick. Over there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the face of the Dollmaker's twisted obsession, Yinlin argues that puppets cannot replace real family and that it is wrong to take advantage of others' happiness to cope with one's own misfortune. The Dollmaker retorts that he has erased her Patroller records, making it impossible for her to prove her identity. But Yinlin asserts that even without this identity, she will continue to fight evil. That is the spirit her parents instilled in her, and the one that motivates her to pursue her goals in her own way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You activate the switch to let Chixia and the other Patrollers into the inner chamber.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover! Are you okay?!

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm fine. What about the others?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've sent those civilians back to Jinzhou for medicals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But they weren't super excited to leave for some reason. They didn't want to be separated from those puppets, no matter what...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There was really not much we could do about it...

Options.PlotLineKey: They'll need some time to process.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, where's that woman who kidnapped you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't tell me she's already gone... Quick, we're going after her!

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't think that's necessary at this point.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uhh.... Yeah, she's a slippery one. Unlikely we can track her down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also... Something about her seems.... not so evil? No, can't make assumptions. She's still a suspect!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh, we'll table that for now. Rover, you're a crucial witness. Please, come to the Bureau for a statement when you can.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll see you there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After the Patrollers secure the scene, Chixia updates you on the Séance Society's other members, but by then, Yinlin has already disappeared. You promise Chixia that you will go to the Public Security Bureau to provide a formal statement of what happened.

Chapters.Title: Go inside the puppet factory to stop Dollmaker
Return to Jinzhou and explain the situation to Chixia

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So that's what the Séance Society was up to... Thanks for your statement, it really helped!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Somehow the Fractsidus was involved too! Who could have thought… Luckily you were there to stop them in time!

Options.PlotLineKey: How's the Dollmaker?
How are the Séance Society people doing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The man's still not saying anything... Guess we'll have to keep him under custody for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing about that suspect lady either. We still have zero info on her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Most of those Resonators have varying degrees of Overclocking. They need urgent care, the professionals from Huaxu Academy are already on it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A guy named Lirong had it worst, didn't wake up from his coma until yesterday.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
