Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He's still recovering from some really bad aftereffects, but at least he's making progress.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, so the missing cases led to an illegal cult-like organization AND a bunch of other twisted plans!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unbelievable... We'd be toast without your help.

Options.PlotLineKey: Actually, I couldn't do it without someone else's help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? And who's that?

Options.PlotLineKey: An emissary of justice, hidden in the shadows.
An honorable companion.
I'm not sure whether she's a friend or foe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Come on, you need to be more specific… Whoever they are, sounds like they'll make for quite the Patroller.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll be sure to tell her that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, that's it for now. Ring me up when you find something unusual again. I'll catch you later!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You learn from Chixia that the injured are recovering, but the Dollmaker still refuses to cooperate. She thanks you for your help, and you hint that the real thanks should go to a mysterious partner. However, you make sure to keep the partner's name a secret.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A letter without a signature. It can only lead to one thing.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Yinlin. She's waiting for me.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Same as last time, she said... Must be the wolf markings. I should look around.)

Chapters.Title: Use Sensor to find the markings
Use Sensor to find the markings

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Splendid view, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As promised, I owe you a lot of explanation.

Options.PlotLineKey: Had you been planning to get me involved?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I wasn't expecting to meet you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My order was to oversee our deal with the Fractsidus.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were just a pawn in my plan to find where Lirong kept the puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I didn't expect him to try and escape with them. Couldn't risk exposing myself yet, so I had to track him down and retrieve the puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Around that time, Dollmaker caught wind of your special abilities. He asked me to bring you to that safe house.

Options.PlotLineKey: You zapped me a little too hard back there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe… Oh, really? I even upped the voltage for the best effect. Was that just a zap to you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No wonder our Dollmaker took so much interest in that body of yours.

Options.PlotLineKey: So he couldn't recover my memories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, no. He tried but couldn't gain access.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to him, you possess a power beyond his understanding that prevented him from prying into your mind. You might be more special than you had thought.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Said he couldn't read your mind without risking his own sanity, let alone retrieve any information... I can't imagine what the hell is going on beneath your skull.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who knows? Maybe you helped some strangers again only to mess with the wrong person, and ended up with your memories gone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I say you should stop playing hero and take better care of yourself. You'll live longer that way.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you worried about me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't think I need to, since you can handle yourself just fine. But... if you ever need my help, just let me know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We have a lot in common. Both alone in this world.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe I'll keep you in my thoughts. A reminder that I'm not the only solitary soul out there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And eventually, we'll both learn to move through our lives with loneliness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps the same loneliness was too much for Dollmaker to bear... That's why he gave up everything to resurrect my parents.

Options.PlotLineKey: He had companions, he just never cherished them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes… After my parents' death, we all became chess pieces to him, myself included.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Raised me to be a Patroller for his own agenda. He needed a mole in the Public Security Bureau.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end I did become a Patroller, but failed to stay by his side as he desired.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe I'm indeed a heart-wrenching betrayer to him...

Options.PlotLineKey: He dug his own grave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... We all have to face the consequences of our actions. I don't plan to defend him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if I had acted sooner, this whole mess could have been avoided. Why didn't I do something?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps… like everyone else in the Séance Society, I too held onto that naive pipe dream.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The dream of finally meeting my parents and having a real family... I indulged in it more than I care to admit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Deep down, I knew my dream was built upon the sacrifices of innocent lives... but I couldn't bear to shatter it.

Options.PlotLineKey: In the end, you still fulfilled your duty. As a Patroller.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph... because I met you. A total outsider risking {Male=his;Female=her} life for me and for all those people...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A lot of it still remains unresolved. Dollmaker was merely a cog in the wheel. A bigger shadow lingers.

Options.PlotLineKey: The Fractsidus…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. We must stay vigilant until we expose the true culprits and destroy their plans for good.

Options.PlotLineKey: We?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't tell me you're pulling out at this point?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you are, I may have to wipe my true identity from your head by force...

Options.PlotLineKey: Please go easy on me…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was a joke. Anyway, I should thank you... Because of you, I was able to accomplish far more and save many more lives than I imagined.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You feel different. I have the feeling I can always trust your words, whatever you say.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you mean it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... Well, take a guess?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and lastly… There is another thing I should thank you for. For trusting me all the way till the very end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until we meet again, Rover… Perhaps I'll meet you under an entirely different identity next time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you meet Yinlin again, she tells you that the Dollmaker attempted to extract your memories but failed. The cause of your memory loss is far more complex than you thought. She thanks you for your help and coyly suggests that your next meeting may be under a completely different guise.
